# Image Prompts for 7-Day Calendar
**Agent:** Design Agent (Simulated)

## Day 1: Carousel Cover
**Prompt:** A relatable, empathetic image of a woman sitting at a modern office desk, looking tired/resting head on hand. Soft natural lighting from a window. Color palette: Warm neutrals, cream, soft teal accents. Text overlay area (top or bottom) clear for: "Why 3 PM feels like hitting a wall". Style: Lifestyle photography, not overly staged.

## Day 3: Reel Cover
**Prompt:** Vertical 9:16 image. Top-down view of a minimalist desk setup. A laptop, a notebook, and a jar of ThyroVibe Almond Butter open with a spoon. A clock or phone screen in the corner shows "2:00 PM". Bright, energetic lighting. Colors: Teal, White, wood textures. Text overlay: "Stop the Crash".

## Day 5: Product Shot
**Prompt:** High-quality product photography. A glass jar of ThyroVibe Almond Butter centered. Surrounded by raw almonds, pumpkin seeds, and Brazil nuts scattered artistically. Background: Split textured surface (half white marble, half soft teal). Lighting: Soft, directional sunlight creating gentle shadows. Mood: Clean, healthy, premium function.
